title: Bedtime Stories for the Holidays: 18 Stories to Read with Kids Before Santa Comes
description: Are you ready for the funniest bestselling short story of 2017? Bundle on sale now for the holidays! You get 18 stories to read for the price of just one!These stories are fun, cute, hilarious and you won't believe how the scary story ends!Kids love the cuddly animal characters!**Scroll up and click "Buy Now" to reserve your copy forever!**
author: Betty J. Byers
